headline: Growth Opportunities and Robust Resources Draw Four Advisors Managing Nearly $300 Million in Client Assets to Ameriprise Financial
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 11, 2025--Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) recently welcomed four experienced financial advisors who collectively manage nearly $300 million in client assets. The advisors have joined Kuttin Wealth Management, a well-established team within Ameriprise’s independent channel led by Barron’s Hall of Fame advisor Jon Kuttin, CRPC™, AAMS®, AWMA®, CMFC™, CRPS™, APMA®.

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 Facing Challenges
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.
